docs.snippet: ANOTHER Hungarian semipostal series has arrived which was issued during the time the Magyar country was an Axis satellite. The purpose is indicated by the inscription on all nine values: "A felar a hadigondozas javara" (Surtax for war relief).
docs.lead_paragraph: ANOTHER Hungarian semipostal series has arrived which was issued during the time the Magyar country was an Axis satellite. The purpose is indicated by the inscription on all nine values: "A felar a hadigondozas javara" (Surtax for war relief).
